bug.author: ali8zake
bug.description:
hello: the juypter spwain run error ,and timeout after 30min run it in 5node k8s 1.14 cluster , vm ,8G memory ,default storeclass is nfs mount how to expalin ,why contianer 8f858795b7987c20263363f16b57968c2ad78034c2ab146a6f308890c95d624e born later,can hold the name thanks, sorry for my poor english Type Reason Age From Message <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
Warning FailedScheduling 13m default-scheduler pod has unbound immediate PersistentVolumeClaims (repeated 4 times) Normal Scheduled 13m default-scheduler Successfully assigned kubeflow/jupyter-hello0705 to 10.104.110.86 Warning Failed 10m kubelet, 10.104.110.86 Error: context deadline exceeded Warning Failed 8m45s (x11 over 10m) kubelet, 10.104.110.86 Error: Error response from daemon: Conflict. The container name "/k8s_notebook_jupyter-hello0705_kubeflow_bc794180-9f25-11e9-9fb9-fa163e94b22c_0" is already in use by container "8f858795b7987c20263363f16b57968c2ad78034c2ab146a6f308890c95d624e". You have to remove (or rename) that container to be able to reuse that name. Normal Pulled 2m56s (x30 over 12m) kubelet, 10.104.110.86 Container image "registry.aliyuncs.com/kubeflow-images-public/tensorflow-1.10.1-notebook-cpu:v0.4.0" already present on machine [root@10 containers]# docker ps -a |grep jupyter d12c59da07d1 df2b8f172b44 "tini -- start-singl‚Ä¶" 6 minutes ago Created k8s_notebook_jupyter-hello0705_kubeflow_bc794180-9f25-11e9-9fb9-fa163e94b22c_1 8f858795b798 df2b8f172b44 "tini -- start-singl‚Ä¶" 13 minutes ago Removal In Progress k8s_notebook_jupyter-hello0705_kubeflow_bc794180-9f25-11e9-9fb9-fa163e94b22c_0 849f366aeac5 mirrorgooglecontainers/pause-amd64:3.1 "/pause" 13 minutes ago Up 13 minutes k8s_POD_jupyter-hello0705_kubeflow_bc794180-9f25-11e9-9fb9-fa163e94b22c_0 [root@10 containers]# ls -lcrth /var/lib/docker/containers/8f858795b7987c20263363f16b57968c2ad78034c2ab146a6f308890c95d624e ÊÄªÁî®Èáè 20K drwx------ 2 root root 6 7Êúà 5 09:13 checkpoints -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 2.2K 7Êúà 5 09:13 hostconfig.json -rw------- 1 root root 13K 7Êúà 5 09:13 config.v2.json [root@10 containers]# ls -lcrth /var/lib/docker/containers/849f366aeac51064ccb5de7de294d0491fe9b5beb7db70e2a8d414a19483937d/ drwx------ 2 root root 6 7Êúà 5 09:06 checkpoints -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 71 7Êúà 5 09:06 resolv.conf.hash drwx------ 3 root root 16 7Êúà 5 09:06 mounts -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 150 7Êúà 5 09:06 hosts -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 18 7Êúà 5 09:06 hostname -rw-r----- 1 root root 0 7Êúà 5 09:06 849f366aeac51064ccb5de7de294d0491fe9b5beb7db70e2a8d414a19483937d-json.log -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 1.6K 7Êúà 5 09:06 hostconfig.json -rw------- 1 root root 3.1K 7Êúà 5 09:06 config.v2.json -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 130 7Êúà 5 09:06 resolv.conf The container name "/k8s_notebook_jupyter-hello0705_kubeflow_bc794180-9f25-11e9-9fb9-fa163e94b22c_0" is already in use by container "8f858795b7987c20263363f16b57968c2ad78034c2ab146a6f308890c95d624e". You have to remove (or rename) that container to be able to reuse that name.

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.77. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ali8zake>@ali8zake</denchmark-link> , looking at it seems like there is a problem with the Notebooks PVCs. Are all the PVCs used from this Notebook Bound?

[root@10 ~]# kubectl get pvc -n kubeflow NAME STATUS VOLUME CAPACITY ACCESS MODES STORAGECLASS AGE katib-mysql Bound pvc-a818506a-9e44-11e9-9fb9-fa163e94b22c 10Gi RWO managed-nfs-storage 4d21h minio-pv-claim Bound pvc-726028d1-9f03-11e9-a233-fa163e9c27fc 10Gi RWO managed-nfs-storage 3d22h mysql-pv-claim Bound pipeline-mysql-pv2 10Gi RWO managed-nfs-storage 5d1h xiamen-workspace Bound pvc-dbd0cbf5-a219-11e9-98db-fa163e94b22c 10Gi RWO managed-nfs-storage 6m48s [root@10 ~]# kubectl get storageclass NAME PROVISIONER AGE managed-nfs-storage (default) example.com/nfs 7d21h nfs example.com/nfs 7d21h i run it again : Warning FailedScheduling 8m4s default-scheduler pod has unbound immediate PersistentVolumeClaims (repeated 3 times) Normal Scheduled 8m3s default-scheduler Successfully assigned kubeflow/jupyter-xiamen to 10.104.110.90 Warning Failed 6m2s kubelet, 10.104.110.90 Error: context deadline exceeded Warning Failed 3m43s (x11 over 6m2s) kubelet, 10.104.110.90 Error: Error response from daemon: Conflict. The container name "/k8s_notebook_jupyter-xiamen_kubeflow_dbdf0f0d-a219-11e9-98db-fa163e94b22c_0" is already in use by container "04d5de4542c07ee88a5fffe757aa251a4c8c3ef854f727714827171be8cc3159". You have to remove (or rename) that container to be able to reuse that name. Normal Pulled 3m2s (x15 over 8m2s) kubelet, 10.104.110.90 Container image "registry.aliyuncs.com/kubeflow-images-public/tensorflow-1.12.0-notebook-cpu:v0.4.0" already present on machine

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/kimwnasptd>@kimwnasptd</denchmark-link> use docker ps -a |grep 04d5de4542c07ee88a5fffe757aa25 ls -la /var/lib/docker/containers |grep 04d5de4542c07ee88a5fffe757aa25 ,nothing found,so i don't know how cause the container hold the name .

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ali8zake>@ali8zake</denchmark-link> PTAL at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/website/issues/935>kubeflow/website#935</denchmark-link> I added some instructions there for how to troubleshoot why your notebooks aren't starting.
